type.name: org.gradle.testkit.runner.BuildTask
type.description: * A task that was executed when running a specific build. * * @since 2.6 * @see BuildResult

method.name: getOutcome
method.description: * The outcome of attempting to execute this task. * * @return the task outcome

method.name: getPath
method.description:
* The unique path of the task. *

* The task path is a combination of its enclosing project's path and its name. * For example, in multi project build the {@code bar} task of the {@code foo} project has a path of {@code :foo:bar}. * In a single project build, the {@code bar} task of the lone project has a path of {@code :bar}. *

* This value corresponds to the value output by Gradle for the task during its normal progress logging. * * @return the task path

property.name: outcome
property.description: * The outcome of attempting to execute this task. * * @return the task outcome

property.name: path
property.description:
* The unique path of the task. *

* The task path is a combination of its enclosing project's path and its name. * For example, in multi project build the {@code bar} task of the {@code foo} project has a path of {@code :foo:bar}. * In a single project build, the {@code bar} task of the lone project has a path of {@code :bar}. *

* This value corresponds to the value output by Gradle for the task during its normal progress logging. * * @return the task path
